channel.title: RuneSource Development Team
channel.description:
I'm looking for 3 good programmers to develop RuneSource with me. Don't be fooled by my low post count and reputation, I just started this account because I don't use this forum often.
What I need from you: Conventions, clean-code, and dedication.
What I have to offer: 4 years of RSPS experience, conventions and clean code.
I can do full combat systems, skills, and the works. I expect you to have past experience doing those as well.
I'm looking for the server to be new age with an old age feel. We'll all share the profits the server makes.
If you are interested please post some work you have done yourself.
skype: mikey.sasse

item.title: RuneSource Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Mikey_Sasse Mikey Sasse
